body.name: Goldcolin Rubber Broom for Pet Hair Remover, Carpet Rake Fur Remover Broom with Squeegee, Carpet Rake for Pet Hair Removal, Pet Hair Rubber Broom for Fluff Carpet, Hardwood Floor, Tile, Window
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 15. Order within 3 hrs 43 mins
features: 【Soft TPR Carpet Rake】The carpet rake is made of soft TPR material. Each individual cleaning head can penetrate into the interior of the carpet that cannot be reached by ordinary brooms to complete deep cleaning of the carpet. The unique electrostatic adsorption function is more convenient for collecting pet hair.

【Curved Rubber Broom Design】Not synchronized with other rubber boom and pet rake on the market. Our rubber boom head adopts an arc design, Rubber broom allows you to better collect hair when dragging back and forth.

【Multi-function Squeegee Edge】The flat squeegee edge of the carpet rake helps to wipe the water or liquid on the window, windshield and shower. Easily clean gardens,floors,courtyards, balconies and cars.

【60" Telescopic Handle】The handle length of pet hair rubber broom is adjustable and can be extended by 24-60 inches. The rubber boom is suitable for people of all heights. Both children and adults can easily clean pet hair.
【Handheld Carpet Rake Combination】Pet hair removal broom and fluff brush combination, portable design can easily clean loose hair and remove fluff on sofa,car seats, floors and seat cushions.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars very sturdy and can remove a section to make shorter
reviews.reviewText: I am not sure why I did not have this sooner; the handle is sturdy and does not bend like some of them do when you apply a little pressure. This works so well on our carpet and helps to save my vacuum; I use this then I vacuum. I removed 1 section to make it shorter to get under my tables and i use the hand help one on the chairs and couches. This really gets the carpet clean. You too will wonder why you did not get it sooner.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fantastic if you have fur babies!
reviews.reviewText: Yup! The handle comes loose on the broom part BUT just add a dab of glue and screw it in. Works great for sand, dirt and hair.The brush that comes with it? Most fantastic hair removal tool I have ever had! To the woman if Florida with the Grat Pyr, thank you for recommending this. Worth it just for the brush!!! You were right!!! Of all the hair removal tools laying around here? This one is superior by far! It gets all the hair the others all miss!!!! Fantastic product. If you have fur babies? Buy it!!!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Brush gets 5-stars & Broom gets 3-stars but w/ handle fix 5-star Rubber broom head
reviews.reviewText: I have a Great Pyrenees and to make matters worse, I live in Florida! That means Pyr Glitter (aka dog hair) is a daily managed thing in my house. For those unfamiliar with the breed, they are a cold weather mountain dog with a double coat. Rubber brooms and brushes are a must if you have dogs with double coats.This hand brush is the best! I have 5 or 6 different rubber brushes around my house to easily take dog hair off not just clothing but rugs, beds, blankets, walls, and pretty much anywhere you can think of that gets dust and dog hair. The design of this hand brush is superior and more effective than all my others. I would buy several of these hand brushes if they were sold separately from the broom as they are that effective.The broom head is awesome but the handle is a PIA. It comes loose when I am sweeping EVERY time. At least it used to before I used some chromed metal tape ( used for A/C ) to secure the screw in mount of the broom handle.I have two Pet vacuums: a Dyson Pet and a Shark Pet. Even after running these as designed on both my hardwoods and my rugs/ carpets the rubber broom and or the brush still manages to pull remaining dog hair. Oh... and these vacuums are the best I've used for pet hair but that's a separate discussion.JUST BUY THIS broom & brush, you will not regret it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I really like this broom! This makes ‘sweeping’ my area rugs easy. It’s easy to use and does a good job.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This works so great but it broke 3 days after I got it, you can't put any pressure on it. Mine snapped I tried to glue it, it worked until it broke again. I will try another brand these actually work!!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have dog that sheds heavily. Didn't realize how hair I missed until I used this.Even helped cleaning off the artificial turf.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Worked until it didn't (6mo)
reviews.reviewText: Lasted 6mo constantly battling the unscrewing issue. Finally it snapped in the middle at full length. Thought ok well I'll lose one segment it'll still have some height, wrong. The ends taper down in size as you near the head. So it's max length or the break your back hunched over mini length. Brush head is great, handle is a piece of crap

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I am so mad at myself that I didn't find this sooner! It works so great with pet hair and gets ALL the hair unlike a regular broom. I will be purchasing more to use in the basement and the garage. The rubber makes it easy to still sweep if the floor is a little wet as well.
